兔子不吃窩邊草.pinyin: tù zi bù chī wō biān cǎo
兔子不吃窩邊草.definition: lit. a rabbit never eats the grass beside its own burrow (saying); fig. even a scoundrel does not do harm in his immediate neighborhood

兔子尾巴長不了.pinyin: tù zi wěi bā zhǎng bù liǎo
兔子尾巴長不了.definition: rabbits don't have long tails (idiom); its days are numbered; won't last long

兔斯基.definition: Tuzki, a Chinese cartoon rabbit character used in emoticons and stickers, created in 2006

兔死狐悲.definition: lit. if the rabbit dies, the fox grieves (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress

兔死狗烹.definition: lit. to boil the hound once it caught the rabbit (idiom); fig. to get rid of sb once he has served his purpose
